title: Update and Correct Framework Documentation
description: The analysis from 2025-11-12 revealed that key documentation (like GEMINI.md) is outdated and contains incorrect information (e.g., non-existent make commands). This task is to review and update all core framework documentation to reflect the current state of the repository.
acceptance_criteria: The 'GEMINI.md' file is updated with the correct commands and information.
Other developer-facing documentation is reviewed and corrected.
All documented commands and workflows are verified to be working as described.
notes: Accurate documentation is essential for both human developers and AI agents to interact with the framework effectively.
